Package mru.game.view

Class gameplayMenu

java.lang.Object
mru.game.view.gameplayMenu
public class gameplayMenu extends Object
This class handles all the display messages related with the gameplay

      dealerCard - The dealers card to display as a String

      maxBet - the maximum amount a player can bet, which is there account balance
